author: mturk
msg: Added pattern matching test function that will be used
instead existing star matcher.

author: billbarker
msg: Re-adding logging for client-cert errors (but from warn->debug).
The this and the previous patch can be combined by simply lowering the logging level on Http11Processor.
I'm strongly -1 on passing untrusted-certs through.  It is easy enough to add the CA to the keystore, and it is a major security hole to except forged certs.

author: costin
msg: Allow connections from clients with untrusted certificates.
The connection will be secure, but the cert can't be verified.
We should try to extract the cert even if it can't be verified - but that's more
complex ( JSSE throws exception "Invalid certificate" )

author: mturk
msg: If we matched the host ensure that we actually create
the host bean. Setting JkUriSet inside location, now
creates that bean.

author: mturk
msg: Do not create dir config for null path.
If someone wish to map the TC root set that in <Location / >.
Aslo do not provide default port to the (It's set to zero) setting,
and only set the virtual hosts. We allready have default host entry.
One thing missing is creating host bean in that case. (To be solved).
